GSD.product_version: versions from v3.11 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
net: mlx5: eliminate anonymous module_init & module_exit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 459b413821efdfb0aa3122da0d9c4667da931bf9, it was introduced in version v3.11 by commit e126ba97dba9edeb6fafa3665b5f8497fc9cdf8c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: mlx5: eliminate anonymous module_init & module_exit
